
Installation order

1. For GNU/Linux operation system(Ubuntu, Debian etc.):
 a. Unpackage .tar.gz archive
 b. Run /bin/bash install.sh
 c. Run /bin/bash SimpleNetworkMonitor.sh

2. For Windows 32 and 64 bit operation system (7, 8 etc.) 
 a. Unpackage .zip archive
 b. Run installation package WinPcap_4_1_3.exe
 c. Run SimpleNetorkMonitor.exe
